record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1902. Fifth row: Eli P. Gale, Xenophon B. Kalamatiano, and Forrest G. Smith; fourth row: Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), William R. Jayne, Ernest Eugene Quantrell, Frederick Adolph Speik, Hayward D. Warner, and Oscar E. Granberg; third row: Robert Lewellyn Henry, Lambert Arundel Hopkins, Hugo Morris Friend, Ernest Earl Perkins, and Ernest Wilson Miller; second row: William Gorham Matthews, Richard H. Wellington, Fred Graham Moloney (captain), and Jerome Pratt Magee; first row: Zelmer Roswell Pettet, Alfred William Place, Ferdinand Mosley Horton, Clyde Amel Blair, and Mortimer Llewellyn Cahill. Gift of Robert L. Henry, Class of 1902.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Photographer stamp and signature, mounted on board.
